title: God Damn Devil
quote: The time has come to say goodbye.
The end is here for those who steal, lie and cheat.
There will be torture and there will be pain.
This is hell. Die in the flames!
original: The time has come to say goodbye
The end is here for those who cheat, steal and lie
There will be torture and there will be pain
Cause this is hell, baby, die in the flames
